ProductInfo.Features:
Box Contents - Fujitsu STYLISTIC Q550 Slate Tablet PC, 4-cell Lithium Polymer Battery (up to 8-hours & 10 minutes),
Superbly bright (400 nit) 10.1 WXGA LED backlit IPS display with 160-degree vertical and horizontal viewing angles
Digital pen and capacitive multi-touch for ease-of-use,WiFi connect to the Internet.
Balanced and ultralight design,Fujitsu Software, 1-Year Limited International Warranty Features
Unique quick-swap (user removable) battery,Windows 7 Professional 32-bit, Microsoft Office Starter 2010
Max. internal resolution 1280 x 800, 16M colors
Simultaneous display resolution: 1280 x 800,
16M colors
External display resolution: Supports 480p,
720p, and 1080i
ProductInfo.Name: Fujitsu STYLISTIC Q550 10.1" 1280 x 800 LED Net-tablet PC - Atom Z670 1.50 GHz 62GB SSD 2GB RAM Q550-62GB-02
